Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Western
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Western and 63rd: due to, fire department activity near 63rd/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Western, 63rd and over the regular route, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81 Lawrence

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
